dcterms:creator: I. Chingovska
A. Anjos
S. Marcel
dcterms:description: The Idiap Replay-Attack database contains 1,300 videos, recorded with a built-in webcam of a Macbook Air laptop, including both live and spoofed videos under various lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: Replay-Attack

dcterms:creator: D. Wen
H. Han
A. K. Jain
dcterms:description: The MSU Mobile Face Spoof database contains 280 videos recorded from 35 candidates using two kinds of cameras, focusing on face spoof detection with image distortion analysis.
dcterms:title: MSU-MFSD

dcterms:creator: Z. Zhang
J. Yan
S. Liu
Z. Lei
D. Yi
S. Z. Li
dcterms:description: The CASIA-FASD database consists of warped photo attacks, video-replay attacks, and cut-photo attacks, providing a comprehensive dataset for face anti-spoofing research.
dcterms:title: CASIA-FASD

dcterms:creator: Z. Boulkenafet
J. Komulainen
L. Li
X. Feng
A. Hadid
dcterms:description: The OULU-NPU dataset is a mobile face presentation attack database that includes real-world variations and is designed to evaluate face anti-spoofing methods under different conditions.
dcterms:title: OULU-NPU
